dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed inside plate): 27 × 14.7 cm (10 5/8 × 5 13/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888
markings: In graphite, verso lower right: W.Kj
inscribed:
Signed and dated in plate, loewr left corner: H. Goltzius fecit Ao 1582

Four lines in Dutch verses in margin below plate, lower center: : Des lants weluaert, ... lofflick te prysen. / Harman Adolfz excudit Haerlemensis.
